name: @assistant/mobile-web
description: Capacitor mobile build for AI Assistant (Android/iOS)

scripts.android:add: npx @capacitor/cli telemetry off && npx @capacitor/cli add android && node scripts/patch-android-security.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-fontscale.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-share.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-firebase.mjs
scripts.android:sync: npx @capacitor/cli sync android && node scripts/patch-android-security.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-fontscale.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-share.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-firebase.mjs
scripts.android:build: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build:release: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android:run: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew installDebug
scripts.ios:add: npx @capacitor/cli telemetry off && npx @capacitor/cli add ios
